entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus was evidently spending the night in the headmaster’s study at Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry continued up the stairs until he reached the topmost landing where there were only two doors.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: The one facing him bore a nameplate reading Sirius.

entities.name: bedroom
entities.description: The one facing him bore a nameplate reading Sirius. Harry had never entered his godfather’s bedroom before.
